attributes.action: claire lomas to light the olympic flame
attributes.additional_details: Claire Lomas completed the London Marathon in 16 days despite being paralysed from the neck down. In my opinion Claire is an inspiration to able bodied and non able bodied persons. Claire demonstrates to me what is Great about Britain and what can be done if you have a desire to achieve. THE perfect candidate to light the Olympic flame. I want the Government to promote the use of Claire Lomas to light the Olympic flame in the opening ceremony.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the London Organising Committee of the Olympic and Paralympic Games (LOCOG).
